title: The Eternal Army
body:
The Eternal Army

"Huh, where am I?" Evan muttered while looking around.

But when he looked around he wasn't able to see anything. There was just darkness all around him.

"What is this place?" Evan said with a raised eyebrow because after getting his monarch core he was easily able to see in darkness, but here he wasn't able to see anything.

There was nothing but darkness as far as his eyes can see.

"I used the shadow energy to kill that guy, and passed out because of the backlash of using it." Evan tried to remember what happened to him,

"If I remember correctly Valery gave me a healing potion before I passed out," Evan said and once again looked around him with doubtful eyes.

"Is that brain-dead woman brought me here?" Evan was feeling uncomfortable when he thought about it.

Other than backlash, the reason he was hesitating to use shadow energy at that time was because he did not want to let anyone know about it.
